org.springframework.data.redis.connection.jedis

接口 JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder

  • 所有已知实现类:
    JedisClientConfiguration.DefaultJedisClientConfigurationBuilder
    封闭接口:
    JedisClientConfiguration

    public static interface JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder
    Builder for JedisClientConfiguration.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      JedisClientConfiguration build()
      Build the JedisClientConfiguration with the configuration applied from this builder.
      JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder clientName(String clientName)
      Configure a clientName to be set with CLIENT SETNAME.
      JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder connectTimeout(Duration connectTimeout)
      Configure a connection timeout.
      JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder readTimeout(Duration readTimeout)
      Configure a read timeout.
      JedisClientConfiguration.JedisPoolingClientConfigurationBuilder usePooling()
      Enable connection-pooling.
      JedisClientConfiguration.JedisSslClientConfigurationBuilder useSsl()
      Enable SSL connections.

    • 方法详细资料

      • useSsl

        JedisClientConfiguration.JedisSslClientConfigurationBuilder useSsl()
        Enable SSL connections.
        返回:
        JedisClientConfiguration.JedisSslClientConfigurationBuilder.

      • usePooling

        JedisClientConfiguration.JedisPoolingClientConfigurationBuilder usePooling()
        Enable connection-pooling.
        返回:
        JedisClientConfiguration.JedisPoolingClientConfigurationBuilder.

      • clientName

        JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder clientName(String clientName)
        Configure a clientName to be set with CLIENT SETNAME.
        参数:
        clientName - must not be null.
        返回:
        this builder.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if clientName is null.

      • readTimeout

        JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder readTimeout(Duration readTimeout)
        Configure a read timeout.
        参数:
        readTimeout - must not be null.
        返回:
        this builder.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if readTimeout is null.

      • connectTimeout

        JedisClientConfiguration.JedisClientConfigurationBuilder connectTimeout(Duration connectTimeout)
        Configure a connection timeout.
        参数:
        connectTimeout - must not be null.
        返回:
        this builder.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if connectTimeout is null.

      • build

        JedisClientConfiguration build()
        Build the JedisClientConfiguration with the configuration applied from this builder.
        返回:
        a new JedisClientConfiguration object.
